BodyName: Committee on Consumer Affairs and Business Licensing

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to allowing food service establishments to charge a COVID-19 recovery charge
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing food service establishments to charge a COVID-19 recovery charge.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to restricting single-use plastic beverage straws, beverage stirrers and beverage splash sticks, and to repeal chapter 4 of title 16 of such code, relating to rechargeable batteries
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Restricting single-use plastic beverage straws, beverage stirrers and beverage splash sticks, and to repeal chapter 4 of title 16 of such code, relating to rechargeable batteries.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to applications for retail dealer licenses for sale of cigarettes or tobacco products
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Applications for retail dealer licenses for sale of cigarettes or tobacco products.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Rosenthal and Powers
